#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    vector<int> v;
    int a;
    string str;
    char c;
    c = getchar();
    while (c!='\n' && c != '\0' && c != EOF) {
        if ((c >= '0') && (c <= '9')) {
            v.push_back(c-'0');
        }
        c = getchar();
    }
    sort(v.begin(), v.end());
    int num = 0;
    int fina = 0;
    int mini = 1000000000;
    do {
            int cnt = 0;
            num = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) {
                num = num*10+v[i];
            }

            for (int i = 1; i <= (int)(sqrt(num)); i++) {
                if (num % i == 0) {
                    cnt++;
                 //   cout << i << " ";
                }
                int te = num/i;
                if (num % te == 0 && te != i) {
                    cnt++;
                  //  cout << te << " ";
                }
            }
            //cout << num << " factors" << cnt << endl;
            //cout << "mini" << mini << endl;
            if (cnt < mini) {
                mini = cnt;
                fina = num;
            }

    } while (next_permutation(v.begin(),v.end()));
    if (mini != 1000000000) {
        cout << fina << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
